name: Fluvstruck
description:
Fluvstruck is an adult dating sim experience, combining time management skills and memory challenges to create a fun interactive visual novel. Each mini-game date gives you the chance to please the girl you’re trying to impress.



You’re a writer who has the absolute inability to write romantic novels - until you have a fateful encounter with Yuna, your book editor and succubus. Yuna gives you a magical app that allows you to experience love first hand and eventually write the book of your dreams… at a price.
